entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-01
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, .NET 6, validation-installer-.NET 6, installer #installer-101557-.NET6 #11497
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main installer, .NET 7.0.1xx SDK, validation-installer-.NET 7.0.1xx SDK #installer-102513-.NET7.0.1xxSDK #11581
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, installer, .NET 7.0.1xx SDK, validation-installer-.NET 7.0.1xx SDK #installer-103284-.NET7.0.1xxSDK #11635

Updated

  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main installer, .NET 5 SDK 5.0.4xx, validation-installer-.NET 5 SDK 5.0.4xx #installer-101408-.NET5SDK5.0.4xx #11496
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, installer, .NET 6.0.1xx SDK RC 1, validation-installer-.NET 6.0.1xx SDK RC 1 #installer-102457-.NET6.0.1xxSDKRC1 #11587
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main .NET 5 SDK 5.0.2xx, validation-installer-.NET 5 SDK 5.0.2xx, installer #installer-103881-.NET5SDK5.0.2xx #11689

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0.1xx-rc1] Update files that should not be signed (#11810) #11820
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Update files that should not be signed (#11810) #11819
  • Add x64 emulation support to pkg installers #11813

Merged

  • [ArPow] Reduce the size of the tarball. #11662
  • Update files that should not be signed #11810
  • [ArPow] Update prebuilts and pipeline build agents #11779

Updated

  • [ArPow] Run smoke tests for tarball CI #11023
